clear_schedule.name: Clear schedule
clear_schedule.description: Clear all scheduled charging entries on the Homevolt device

device_id.name: Device
device_id.description: The Homevolt device to clear the schedule for

set_idle.name: Set battery to idle
set_idle.description: Set the Homevolt battery to idle mode (no charge/discharge). Requires local mode to be enabled.

device_id.name: Device
device_id.description: The Homevolt device to set to idle

offline.name: Offline
offline.description: Take inverter offline during idle mode

set_charge.name: Set battery to charge
set_charge.description: Set the Homevolt battery to charge mode (inverter charge from grid/solar). Requires local mode to be enabled.

device_id.name: Device
device_id.description: The Homevolt device to set to charge

set_discharge.name: Set battery to discharge
set_discharge.description: Set the Homevolt battery to discharge mode (inverter discharge to home/grid). Requires local mode to be enabled.

device_id.name: Device
device_id.description: The Homevolt device to set to discharge

set_grid_charge.name: Set battery to grid charge
set_grid_charge.description: Set the Homevolt battery to grid charge mode (force charge from grid). Requires local mode to be enabled.

device_id.name: Device
device_id.description: The Homevolt device to set to grid charge

set_grid_discharge.name: Set battery to grid discharge
set_grid_discharge.description: Set the Homevolt battery to grid discharge mode (force discharge to grid). Requires local mode to be enabled.

device_id.name: Device
device_id.description: The Homevolt device to set to grid discharge

set_grid_charge_discharge.name: Set battery to grid charge/discharge
set_grid_charge_discharge.description: Set the Homevolt battery to bidirectional grid mode (allows both charging from and discharging to grid). Requires local mode to be enabled.

device_id.name: Device
device_id.description: The Homevolt device to set to grid charge/discharge

charge_setpoint.name: Max charge power
charge_setpoint.description: Optional maximum charge power in watts

discharge_setpoint.name: Max discharge power
discharge_setpoint.description: Optional maximum discharge power in watts

set_solar_charge.name: Set battery to solar charge
set_solar_charge.description: Set the Homevolt battery to solar charge mode (charge from solar production only). Requires local mode to be enabled.

device_id.name: Device
device_id.description: The Homevolt device to set to solar charge

set_solar_charge_discharge.name: Set battery to solar charge/discharge
set_solar_charge_discharge.description: Set the Homevolt battery to solar charge/discharge mode (solar-based grid management). Requires local mode to be enabled.

device_id.name: Device
device_id.description: The Homevolt device to set to solar charge/discharge

charge_setpoint.name: Max charge power
charge_setpoint.description: Optional maximum charge power in watts

discharge_setpoint.name: Max discharge power
discharge_setpoint.description: Optional maximum discharge power in watts

set_full_solar_export.name: Set battery to full solar export
set_full_solar_export.description: Set the Homevolt battery to full solar export mode (export all solar production). Requires local mode to be enabled.

device_id.name: Device
device_id.description: The Homevolt device to set to full solar export

set_schedule.name: Set schedule
set_schedule.description: Replace the battery schedule with a list of entries. Requires local mode to be enabled.

device_id.name: Device
device_id.description: The Homevolt device to set the schedule for

schedule.name: Schedule
schedule.description: List of schedule entries with type (0-9), times, SOC limits, and power settings
